001
002package com.commercetools.api.product;
003
004import java.time.LocalDate;
005import java.time.LocalTime;
006import java.time.ZonedDateTime;
007import java.time.format.DateTimeFormatter;
008import java.util.List;
009import java.util.Map;
010import java.util.stream.Collectors;
011
012import com.commercetools.api.models.product.Attribute;
013import com.commercetools.api.models.product.ProductVariant;
014
015public class AttributeAccessor {
016    public static Map<String, Object> asAttributeMap(final ProductVariant variant) {
017        return variant.getAttributes().stream().collect(Collectors.toMap(Attribute::getName, Attribute::getValue));
018    }
019
020    public static Map<String, Attribute> asMap(final ProductVariant variant) {
021        return variant.getAttributes().stream().collect(Collectors.toMap(Attribute::getName, attribute -> attribute));
022    }
023
024    public static LocalDate asDate(final Attribute attribute) {
025        return LocalDate.parse((String) attribute.getValue(), DateTimeFormatter.ISO_LOCAL_DATE);
026    }
027
028    public static LocalTime asTime(final Attribute attribute) {
029        return LocalTime.parse((String) attribute.getValue(), DateTimeFormatter.ISO_LOCAL_TIME);
030    }
031
032    public static ZonedDateTime asDateTime(final Attribute attribute) {
033        return ZonedDateTime.parse((String) attribute.getValue(), DateTimeFormatter.ISO_ZONED_DATE_TIME);
034    }
035
036    @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
037    public static List<LocalDate> asSetDate(final Attribute attribute) {
038        return ((List<String>) attribute.getValue()).stream()
039                .map(s -> LocalDate.parse(s, DateTimeFormatter.ISO_LOCAL_DATE))
040                .collect(Collectors.toList());
041    }
042
043    @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
044    public static List<LocalTime> asSetTime(final Attribute attribute) {
045        return ((List<String>) attribute.getValue()).stream()
046                .map(s -> LocalTime.parse(s, DateTimeFormatter.ISO_LOCAL_TIME))
047                .collect(Collectors.toList());
048    }
049
050    @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
051    public static List<ZonedDateTime> asSetDateTime(final Attribute attribute) {
052        return ((List<String>) attribute.getValue()).stream()
053                .map(s -> ZonedDateTime.parse(s, DateTimeFormatter.ISO_ZONED_DATE_TIME))
054                .collect(Collectors.toList());
055    }
056
057}
